Frequently Asked Questions

1. How can I flip the wi-fi earbud on or off?

-When the charging case with electrical energy

-If your charging case isn’t round

When the earbuds is turned on, press and maintain the contact button for 5 seconds to show it off.

2. How to reset of the earbuds?

A: Please put the earbuds within the charging case first and guarantee they’re charging.
